Click to view terms and conditions

Policy on Privacy, Data, Cookies and Marketing Communications
 
Lockwood Publishing will only use information collected about you in accordance with the Data Protection Act 1998.
 
Data
 
Lockwood Publishing may ask you for certain information and you may submit personal data to Sodium (such as your name, email address and contact details) when you subscribe or sign up to Sodium.
 
Lockwood Publishing may also record which parts of Sodium and services you are interested in as well as user traffic patterns and site use. This information will be kept securely in accordance with an internal security policy and may be used to:
(a) process your Communications, your subscription to Sodium and to enable your use of Sodium and associated services;
(b) open and run your account and provide you with an up to date, efficient and reliable service;
(c) administer prize draws;
(d) generally run Sodium.
 
By subscribing and submitting your data you agree to this use.
 
From time to time Lockwood Publishing also monitor and record telephone calls for training purposes and to improve the service to you.
Lockwood Publishing will never collect sensitive information about you without your explicit consent.
If you believe Lockwood Publishing has information about you that you do not want Lockwood Publishing to have or that is incorrect please contact Lockwood Publishing as described below and Lockwood Publishing shall correct or remove the data as you request as soon as reasonably practicable.
 
Marketing Communications
 
Lockwood Publishing gives you a choice of whether or not you want Lockwood Publishing or other reputable companies to contact you about future offers, events and new services or related activities that you may find useful. Lockwood Publishing will not sell or trade personal information to other companies but Lockwood Publishing would like to keep you informed of the developments on Sodium and certain other games produced by Lockwood Publishing. 
Lockwood Publishing will not send you any marketing emails or pass your information on to third parties unless you give your consent or you have given it already. 
 
In Game Advertising
 
Sodium incorporates dynamic advertisement serving technology which enables advertising to be temporarily uploaded into the game on your console and replaced while you are online. If you play these games, we will log information from your console to ensure that the appropriate advertising is presented at the right location within the game and to calculate number of unique and repeat views of advertising. Logged data may include IP address and console MAC address, in game location, length of time an advert was visible, size of the advert and angle of view. We may use information which we have about you to present adverts which we believe will be of particular interest to you. Logged data will be shared with third party companies who operate the advertisement serving technology
 
Security
 
We take commercially reasonable steps to protect your personal information. This includes setting up processes and procedures to minimise unauthorised access to or disclosure of your information. However, we do not guarantee that we will eliminate all risk of misuse of your personal information by intruders. It is important that you keep your password secret to prevent unauthorised access to and use of your PSN account and any payment details which you have saved for your account.
 
Cookies
 
Lockwood Publishing uses ‘cookies’ on Sodium. Cookies are a way that information such as whether you have visited Sodium before is recorded on your computer and used by Lockwood Publishing to improve Sodium and the services available to you. If you do not wish for Lockwood Publishing to use cookies when you use Sodium please adjust your Internet browser settings to not accept cookies. Your computer’s help file should tell you how to do this but please note that this may affect your ability to use Sodium and games.
If you don’t disable cookies Sodium will ask for and store details including your name and email address and may automatically insert certain information on the subscription or Communications forms so that you can use Sodium with less form filling.
 
Privacy
 
If you have any other concerns over privacy, this privacy policy or Sodium please contact Lockwood Publishing as described below.

Charte concernant la confidentialité, les données, les cookies et la communication commerciale
 
Lockwood Publishing s'engage à n'utiliser vos informations que selon les dispositions prévues par la loi britannique de 1998 relative à la protection des données.
 
Données
 
Il se peut que Lockwood Publishing vous demande de communiquer des informations et des données personnelles à Sodium incluant votre nom, votre adresse électronique et vos coordonnées, pendant votre inscription ou votre abonnement à Sodium.
 
"Il se peut également que Lockwood Publishing enregistre les éléments et les services de Sodium qui vous intéressent ainsi que vos habitudes d'utilisation du site. Conformément au règlement de sécurité interne, ces informations peuvent être utilisées pour :
(a) traiter vos demandes, votre abonnement à Sodium et vous permettre d'utiliser les services Sodium associés ;
(b) ouvrir et gérer votre compte, vous fournir un service adapté, efficace et fiable ;
(c) gérer les tirages au sort ;
(d) effectuer la gestion générale de Sodium."
 
En souscrivant un abonnement et en communiquant vos données, vous acceptez les présentes conditions d'utilisation.
 
Il arrive également à Lockwood Publishing d'enregistrer et d'écouter les appels téléphoniques dans le cadre d'une formation ou en vue d'améliorer l'efficacité de son service.
 
Lockwood Publishing s'engage à ne jamais conserver vos informations sans votre accord formel.
 Si vous pensez que Lockwood Publishing détient des informations vous concernant sans avoir obtenu votre accord ou des informations erronées, veuillez contacter Lockwood Publishing comme indiqué ci-après. Lockwood s'engage à corriger ou à supprimer les donnés concernées dès que possible.
 
Communication commerciale
 
Lockwood Publishing vous demande si vous souhaitez que Lockwood Publishing ou tout autre société réputée vous informe des offres, événements, services, ou tout autre activité qui pourraient vous être utiles. L'objectif de Lockwood Publishing n'est pas de vendre ou de divulguer des données personnelles à des sociétés tierces mais de vous tenir informé des développements de Sodium et de d'autres jeux de Lockwood Publishing.
 
Lockwood Publishing s'engage à ne jamais vous faire parvenir de courrier électronique commercial ou transmettre vos informations personnelles à un tiers sans votre accord préalable.
 
Publicité in-game
 
Sodium offre un système de publicité dynamique qui permet de temporairement charger des publicités lorsque vous jouez sur votre console ou en ligne. En fonction des jeux qui vous intéressent, nous enregistrerons des informations sur votre console afin de présenter des publicités qui pourraient vous intéresser à des endroits et des moments adaptés et de calculer le nombre d'affichages uniques et répétés des publicités. Les données enregistrées incluent l'adresse IP, l'adresse de console MAC, le lieu du jeu, la durée de l'affichage, la taille et l'angle de vision d'une publicité. Il se peut que nous utilisions vos informations personnelles afin de vous communiquer des publicités qui pourraient vous intéresser. Les données enregistrées seront transmises aux sociétés qui opèrent le système de publicité.
 
Sécurité
 
Nous nous engageons à prendre des mesures afin de protéger vos informations personnelles incluant la mise en œuvre de process et de procédures permettant de minimiser l'accès non autorisé et la divulgation de vos informations. Néanmoins, nous ne sommes pas en mesure d'éliminer tous les risques d'usage impropre de vos informations personnelles par les intrus. Il vous est vivement recommandé de conserver votre mot de passe à l'abri des regards afin d'éviter tout accès non autorisé ou toute utilisation de votre compte PSN ou de toute autre donnée de paiement que vous avez enregistrée.
 
Cookies
 
Lockwood Publishing utilise des "cookies" dans Sodium qui sont un moyen de conserver des informations sur votre ordinateur, comme de savoir si vous avez déjà visité Sodium, afin de permettre à Lockwood Publishing d'améliorer Sodium et ses services. Si vous refusez que Lockwood Publishing utilise des cookies quand vous jouez à Sodium, veuillez ajuster les paramètres de votre navigateur Internet. Le fichier d'aide de votre ordinateur devrait vous indiquer la procédure prévue à cet effet mais sachez que cela peut affecter la qualité du jeu Sodium et des jeux en général.
 
Si vous acceptez les cookies, Sodium enregistrera les informations que vous nous avez communiquées incluant votre nom et votre adresse électronique afin que vous puissiez passer moins de temps à remplir les formulaires d'abonnement ou de communication et plus de temps à utiliser Sodium.
 
Confidentialité
 
Pour toute question concernant la confidentialité, la présente charte de confidentialité ou Sodium, veuillez contacter Lockwood Publishing comme indiqué ci-après.

Richtlinie zum Datenschutz, Daten, Cookies und Marketing-Mitteilungen
 
Lockwood Publishing verwendet nur Daten, die im Einklang mit dem Data Protection Act von 1998 von Ihnen erhoben wurden.
 
Daten
 
Lockwood Publishing bittet Sie unter Umständen um bestimmte Daten und Sie schicken unter Umständen bestimmte persönliche Daten an Sodium (wie etwa Name, E-Mail-Adresse und Kontaktdaten), wenn Sie sich bei Sodium anmelden bzw. ein Abonnement beginnen.
 
Lockwood Publishing hält unter Umständen auch fest, welche Teile von Sodium und welche Dienstleistungen für Sie von Interesse sind und wie Sie die Website nutzen. Diese Daten werden im Einklang mit einer internen
 
Datenschutzrichtlinie geschützt und können zu folgenden Zwecken verwendet werden:
 
(a) Verarbeitung Ihrer Nachrichten, Ihres Sodium-Abonnements und Bereitstellung von Sodium und assoziierten Dienstleistungen;
(b) Eröffnung und Bereitstellung Ihres Kontos sowie eines aktuellen, effizienten und verlässlichen Services;
(c) Veranstaltung von Verlosungen;
(d) Allgemeiner Betrieb von Sodium.
 
Durch den Abschluss eines Abonnements und das Absenden Ihrer Daten, stimmen Sie dieser Verwendung zu.
 
Von Zeit zu Zeit überwacht Lockwood Publishing Telefongespräche und zeichnet diese zu Trainingszwecken auf, um den Service weiter zu verbessern.
 
Lockwood Publishing erhebt niemals ohne Ihre ausdrückliche Zustimmung persönliche Daten von Ihnen.
 
Sollten Sie der Auffassung sein, Lockwood Publishing sei im Besitz von Daten, die Sie Lockwood Publishing nicht zur Verfügung stellen möchten oder die falsch sind, setzen Sie sich bitte wie unten beschrieben mit Lockwood Publishing in Verbindung, und Lockwood Publishing korrigiert oder löscht die entsprechenden Daten so bald wie technisch möglich.
 
Marketing-Mitteilungen
 
Lockwood Publishing lässt Ihnen die Wahl, ob Sie von Lockwood Publishing oder anderen renommierten Unternehmen hinsichtlich zukünftigen Angeboten, Veranstaltungen und neuen Services oder Aktivitäten kontaktiert werden möchten, die für Sie von Interesse sein könnten. Lockwood Publishing wird keine persönlichen Daten an andere Firmen verkaufen oder weitergeben, möchte Sie aber über die Entwicklung von Sodium und anderen Spielen aus dem Hause Lockwood Publishing auf dem Laufenden halten.
 
Lockwood Publishing schickt Ihnen keine Marketing-E-Mails und gibt Ihre Daten nicht an Dritte weiter, es sei denn, Sie stimmen dem zu bzw. haben dem bereits zugestimmt.
 
In-Game-Werbung
 
Sodium setzt in seinen Spielen dynamische Werbeeinblendungen ein, wodurch Werbung vorübergehend zur Verwendung im Spiel auf Ihre Konsole heruntergeladen und auch ausgetauscht werden kann, wenn Sie online sind. Wenn Sie diese Spiele spielen, sammeln wir Informationen von Ihrer Konsole, um sicher zu gehen, dass die Werbung an der richtigen Stelle im Spiel platziert wird und um die Anzahl einmaliger und mehrfacher Werbekontakte zu erfassen. Zu diesen Informationen zählen Ihre IP-Adresse und die MAC-Adresse Ihrer Konsole, der Standort im Spiel, Anzeigedauer einer Werbung, Größe einer Werbung sowie den Blickwinkel. Unter Umständen verwenden wir die Daten, die wir über Sie haben, um im Spiel Werbung anzuzeigen, die wir für Sie für interessant halten. Die so gespeicherten Daten geben wir an dritte Unternehmen weiter, die für die Bereitstellung der Werbetechnik verantwortlich sind.
 
Sicherheit
 
Wir ergreifen alle wirtschaftlich angemessenen Maßnahmen, um Ihre persönlichen Daten zu schützen. Dazu zählen Prozesse und Maßnahmen zur Minimierung unberechtigter Zugriffe auf bzw. der Freigabe Ihrer Daten. Wir können jedoch nicht garantieren, dass wir jeglichen Missbrauch Ihrer persönlichen Daten durch Dritte ausschließen können. Es ist wichtig, dass Sie Ihr Passwort geheim halten, um die nicht autorisierte Verwendung Ihres PSN-Kontos und den Zugriff auf damit verknüpfte Zahlungsinformationen zu unterbinden.
 
Cookies
 
Lockwood Publishing setzt bei Sodium sogenannte Cookies ein. Mit Cookies werden Informationen, etwa ob und wann Sie Sodium besucht haben, auf Ihrem Computer gespeichert und von Lockwood Publishing verwendet, um Sodium und die Ihnen zur Verfügung stehenden Services zu verbessern. Sollten Sie nicht wünschen, dass Lockwood Publishing Cookies einsetzt, wenn Sie Sodium benutzen, passen Sie bitte die Einstellungen Ihres Internet-Browsers entsprechend an. In der dazugehörigen Hilfedatei finden Sie weitere Informationen dazu, doch bitte beachten Sie, dass sich dies darauf auswirken kann, ob und in welchem Umfang Sie Sodium und Spiele nutzen können.
 
Sollten Sie Cookies nicht deaktivieren, bittet Sie Sodium um Ihren Namen und Ihre E-Mail-Adresse und speichert sie, und setzt dann unter Umständen bestimmte Daten in Abo- und Mitteilungsformulare ein, damit Sie weniger Formularfelder auszufüllen haben.
 
Datenschutz
 
Sollten Sie Bedenken hinsichtlich das Datenschutzes, dieser Richtlinien oder Sodium haben, setzen Sie sich bitte wie im Folgenden beschrieben mit Lockwood Publishing in Verbindung.

Informativa sulla privacy, dati, i cookie e le comunicazioni di marketing
 
Lockwood Publishing userà le informazioni che ti riguardano in accordo con il Data Protection Act 1998.
 
Dati
 
Lockwood Publishing potrebbe richiederti precise informazioni e potresti fornire dati personali a Sodium (quali il tuo nome, indirizzo e-mail e contatti) quando ti iscrivi oppure effettui l'accesso a Sodium.
 
Lockwood Publishing potrebbe rilevare anche verso quali settori e servizi di Sodium tu possa essere interessato così come campioni a riguardo del traffico utente e dell'utilizzo del sito. Questa informazione sarà tenuta al sicuro in accordo con una politica interna per la sicurezza e potrà essere usata per:
 
(a) elaborare le tue comunicazioni, la tua iscrizione a Sodium e per abilitare il tuo utilizzo di Sodium e dei servizi ad esso associati;
(b) aprire e tenere operativo il tuo account e poter fornire un servizio aggiornato, efficiente ed affidabile;
(c) amministrare estrazioni di premi;
(d) eseguire le generiche operazioni di gestione di Sodium.
 
Abbonandoti o fornendo i tuoi dati accetti queste condizioni di utilizzo.
 
Di quando in quando, Lockwood Publishing controlla e registra telefonate per scopi di addestramento e per migliorare il servizio a te fornito.
 
Lockwood Publishing non raccoglierà mai informazioni cruciali che ti riguardano senza il tuo consenso esplicito.
 
Se ritieni che Lockwood Publishing trattenga informazioni che ti riguardano e che tu non vuoi che siano in possesso di Lockwood Publishing o che ritieni non corrette, ti preghiamo di contattare Lockwood Publishing seguendo la procedura descritta più avanti e Lockwood Publishing correggerà o rimuoverà i dati come da tua richiesta nel più breve tempo ragionevolmente possibile.
 
Comunicazioni di marketing
 
Lockwood Publishing ti offre la possibilità di scegliere se desideri essere contattato oppure no da Lockwood Publishing o altre compagnie rispettabili riguardo ad offerte future, eventi e nuovi servizi o attività relative che potresti trovare interessanti. Lockwood Publishing non venderà o negozierà informazioni personali con altre compagnie ma gradirebbe tenerti informato riguardo agli sviluppi di Sodium e di altri giochi prodotti da Lockwood Publishing.
 
Lockwood Publishing non ti invierà nessuna e-mail di marketing o passerà le tue informazioni a terze parte a meno che non riceva il tuo consenso o che tu non lo abbia già espresso.
 
Pubblicità nel gioco
 
Sodium comprende una tecnologia di pubblicità dinamica su server che abilità il temporaneo caricamento della pubblicità nel gioco o sulla tua console e la sostituisce mentre sei online. Se giochi, useremo informazioni presenti sulla tua console per essere sicuri che sia visualizzata la pubblicità corretta per ogni località all'interno del gioco e per calcolare il numero di visualizzazioni singole e ripetute di tale pubblicità. I dati di autenticazione possono comprendere l'indirizzo IP e l'indirizzo MAC della console, località del gioco, durata della visibilità della pubblicità, grandezza dello spazio pubblicitario e angolo di visuale. Potremmo utilizzare le informazioni che ti riguardano per presentare pubblicità che possa essere di tuo interesse. I dati di autenticazione saranno condivisi con compagnie esterne che gestiscono la tecnologia di pubblicità su server.
 
Sicurezza
 
Noi prendiamo ragionevoli misure commerciali per proteggere le tue informazioni personali. Questo comprende porre in atto processi e procedure per minimizzare accessi non autorizzati alla stessa o per impedire che le tue informazioni siano rivelate. In ogni caso, non possiamo garantire di essere in grado di poter eliminare completamente il rischio futuro riguardo a un uso non corretto da parte delle tue informazioni personali da parte di estranei. È importante che tu non riveli la tua password per prevenire accessi e utilizzo non autorizzato del tuo account Playstation®Network e a qualsiasi dettaglio di pagamento che sia stato salvato sul tuo account.
 
I cookie
 
Lockwood Publishing utilizza "cookie" per Sodium. I cookie costituiscono un modo per far sì che informazioni quali il numero di volte che hai visitato Sodium possano essere registrate sul tuo computer e usate da Lockwood Publishing per migliorare Sodium e i servizi resi disponibili per te. Se non desideri che Lockwood Publishing utilizzi i cookie in Sodium ti preghiamo di modificare le impostazioni del tuo browser di Internet affinché i cookie non vengano accettati. Il file di aiuto del tuo computer dovrebbe essere in grado di fornirti assistenza a riguardo ma ti preghiamo di considerare che questo potrebbe influenzare il tuo utilizzo di Sodium e di altri giochi.
 
Se non disabiliti i cookie, Sodium richiederà e salverà dettagli come il tuo nome e indirizzo e-mail e potrebbe inserire automaticamente alcune informazioni nei modelli per l'abbonamento e per comunicazioni così che tu possa utilizzare Sodium senza l'incombenza di dover riempire troppi campi nei modelli predisposti.
 
Informativa sulla privacy.
 
Se desideri ricevere altre informazioni riguardo alla privacy, questa informativa sulla privacy o riguardo a Sodium ti preghiamo di contattare Sodium seguendo la procedura descritta di seguito.

Política de privacidad, datos, cookies y comunicaciones de Marketing
 
Lockwood Publishing solo usará la información recogida sobre tu persona de confomirdad con la Ley de protección de datos 1998.
 
Datos
 
Lockwood Publishing podrá pedirte cierta información y podrás proporcionar información personal a Sodium (como el nombre, la dirección de correo electrónico y los datos de contacto) cuando te suscribas a o te registres con Sodium.
 
Lockwood Publishing también registrará qué partes de Sodium y de sus servicios son de tu interés, además de los patrones de tráfico del usuario y el uso del sitio web. Esta información se guardará de forma segura de acuerdo con una política de seguridad interna y se usará para:
 
(a) Procesar tus comunicaciones, tu suscripción a Sodium y para permitir tu uso de Sodium y de los servicios asociados.
(b) Abrir y cerrar tu cuenta y proporcionarte un servicio actual, eficiente y fiable.
(c) Gestionar los sorteos de premios.
(d) Hacer funcionar Sodium en general.
 
Si te suscribes y envías tus datos, aceptas estos usos.
 
En ocasiones, Lockwood Publishing también sigue y registra llamadas de teléfono por motivos de formación y para mejorar el servicio ofrecido.
 
Lockwood Publishing nunca guardará información delicada sobre ti sin tu consentimiento explícito. Si crees que Lockwood Publishing puede tener información sobre ti que no quieres que tenga, o si se trata de información incorrecta, ponte en contacto con Lockwood Publishing tal y como se explica más abajo y Lockwood Publishing corregirá o borrará dicha información, según tu petición, y tan pronto como le sea posible en un plazo razonable.
 
Comunicaciones de Marketing
 
Lockwood Publishing te da a la opción de elegir si quieres (o no) que esta o cualquier otra compañía acreditada se pongan en contacto contigo sobre futuras ofertas, eventos y servicios nuevos o bien actividades relacionadas que puedas encontrar útiles. Lockwood Publishing no venderá ni intercambiará información personal con otras compañías. Aún así, Lockwood Publishing quiere mantenerte informado del desarrollo de Sodium, así como también de otros juegos producidos por Lockwood Publishing.
 
Lockwood Publishing no te enviará ningún correo electrónico de marketing ni pasará tus datos a terceros, a menos que hayas dado tu consentimiento.
 
Publicidad en el juego
 
Sodium incorpora una tecnología de servicio de publicidad dinámica, que permite que la publicidad se suba de forma temporal al juego de la consola y que se reemplace mientras estás conectado/a. Si juegas a estos juegos, registraremos información de tu consola para asegurarnos de que la publicidad adecuada se muestre en los lugares apropiados del juego y para calcular al número de muestras publicitarias únicas y repetidas. Los datos registrados pueden incluir la dirección IP y las direcciones de consolas MAC, ubicación en el juego, tiempo que un anuncio ha estado visible y ángulo de visualización. Puede que usemos información sobre ti para ofrecerte anuncios que creemos serán de tu interés. Los datos registrados se compartirán solo con las compañías que ofrecen la tecnología publicitaria.
 
Seguridad
 
Tomamos pasos comercialmente razonables para proteger tu información personal. Esto incluye configurar procesos y procedimientos para minimizar el acceso no autorizado a tu información o revelación de la misma. Sin embargo, no garantizamos la supresión de los riesgos de abuso de tu información personal por parte de intrusos. Es importante que guardes tu contraseña en secreto para evitar cualquier acceso no autorizado a tu cuenta de PSN, o el uso de la misma, así como también cualquier dato de pago que hayas guardado para tu cuenta.
 
Cookies
 
Lockwood Publishing usa "cookies" en Sodium. Las cookies se utilizan para registrar información, como si has visitado o no Sodium con anterioridad, en el ordenador, Lockwood Publishing utilizará dicha información para mejorar Sodium y los servicios disponibles. Si no quieres que Lockwood Publishing use cookies al usar Sodium, ajusta la configuración del explorador de Internet para que no acepte las cookies. El archivo de ayuda del ordenador te explica cómo hacerlo, pero ten siempre en cuenta que esto puede afectar tu capacidad para usar Sodium y los juegos.
 
Si no desactivas las cookies, Sodium te pedirá información (y guardará dicha información) sobre tu nombre o correo electrónico y puede que, de forma automática, inserte cierto tipo de información en la suscripción o los formularios de comunicación, así podrás usar Sodium sin tener que rellenar demasiados formularios.
 
Privacidad
 
Si tienes cualquier otro problema sobre la privacidad, sobre esta política de privacidad o sobre Sodium, ponte en contacto con Lockwood Publishing tal y como se indica a continuación.

정보 보호, 데이터, 쿠키 및 홍보물 전달 관련 규정
 
Lockwood Publishing은 1998년 데이터 보호법(Data Protection Act 1998)에 의거해 귀하에 관해 수집된 정보만을 사용할 것입니다.
 
데이터
 
Lockwood Publishing은 귀하께 특정 정보를 요청할 수 있고, 귀하는 Sodium에 가입 또는 등록할 때 Sodium에 개인 정보(본인 이름, 이메일 주소 및 연락 정보 등)를 제출할 수 있습니다. 
 
또 Lockwood Publishing은 귀하가 Sodium 중 어느 부분, 어느 서비스에 관심을 두는지, 그리고 사용자 트래픽 패턴 및 사이트 이용 내역을 기록할 수 있습니다. 이러한 정보는 내부 보안 규정에 따라 안전하게 보관될 것이며, 다음 용도로 사용될 수 있습니다:
(a) 귀하가 제출하신 정보 및 Sodium 가입 신청을 처리하고 Sodium 및 관련 서비스의 사용을 활성화합니다;
(b) 귀하의 계정을 개설 및 운영하고, 귀하에게 효율적이고 믿을 수 있는 최신 서비스를 제공합니다;
(c) 상품 추첨을 실시합니다;
(d) 전체적으로 Sodium을 운영합니다.
 
가입 신청을 하고 본인 정보를 제출함으로써, 귀하는 이러한 개인 정보 사용에 동의하시게 됩니다.
 
또, 때때로 Lockwood Publishing은 교육 및 고객들에 대한 서비스 향상 목적으로 전화 내용을 모니터 및 녹음할 수 있습니다.
Lockwood Publishing은 고객에 대한 민감한 개인 정보를 수집하기 전에 반드시 고객의 명시적인 동의를 구합니다.
귀하 본인이 Lockwood Publishing이 보유하는 것을 원치 않는 본인 정보를 Lockwood Publishing에서 보유하고 있다고 생각되는 경우, 또는 부정확한 본인 정보를 보유하고 있다고 생각되는 경우에는, 아래 나와있는 방법으로 Lockwood Publishing에 연락해 주시면 Lockwood Publishing은 타당한 범위 내에서 가능한 신속하게 귀하의 요청에 따라 해당 정보를 정정 또는 삭제하도록 하겠습니다.
 
홍보물 전달
 
Lockwood Publishing은 Lockwood Publishing 또는 기타 평판이 좋은 기업으로부터 앞으로 있게 될 특별 오퍼, 이벤트, 신규 서비스 또는 귀하에게 유용할 수 있는 관련 활동에 관한 정보를 받아보기를 원하시는지 여부를 귀하가 선택하실 수 있도록 합니다. Lockwood Publishing은 개인 정보를 다른 기업에 판매 또는 교환하지 않을 것이나, Lockwood Publishing은 Sodium 및 Lockwood Publishing이 만드는 다른 특정 게임에 대한 소식은 귀하께 계속 전해드리고자 합니다. 
Lockwood Publishing은 귀하가 동의해 주시거나 이미 동의하신 경우를 제외하고, 귀하께 일체의 홍보용 이메일을 발송하거나 귀하의 정보를 제 3자에게 전달하지 않을 것입니다. 
 
게임 내 광고
 
Sodium은 귀하가 사용하는 콘솔에 일시적으로 게임에 광고를 게시하고 온라인 상태에 계신 동안 광고를 바꿀 수 있게 해 주는 동적 광고 서브 기술을 사용하고 있습니다. Sodium 게임을 플레이하시면, 적절한 광고가 게임 내 적절한 위치에 게시되도록 하고, 광고의 단일 및 반복 뷰 횟수를 계산하기 위해 귀하의 콘솔에서 가져온 정보를 기록합니다. 기록되는 정보에는 IP 주소와 콘솔 MAC 주소, 게임 위치, 해당 광고가 게시된 시간의 길이, 광고의 크기 및 보기 각도 등이 포함될 수 있습니다. 귀하가 특히 관심을 가질 것으로 여겨지는 광고를 게시하기 위해 저희가 보유하고 있는 귀하에 관한 정보를 사용할 수 있습니다. 기록된 정보는 해당 광고 서브 기술을 운영하는 외부 업체와 공유하게 됩니다.
 
보안
 
저희는 귀하의 개인 정보를 보호하기 위해 상업적으로 타당한 조치를 취합니다. 여기에는 귀하에 관한 정보에 대한 허가 받지 않은 액세스 또는 해당 정보의 공개를 최소화하기 위한 프로세스 및 절차를 마련하는 것도 포함됩니다. 하지만 귀하에 관한 정보가 침입자에 의해 악용될 위험을 전부 제거하겠다고 보장하지는 않습니다. 본인의 PSN 계정 및 본인 계정에 대해 본인이 저장해 둔 일체의 지불 내역에 대한 허가 받지 않은 접근 및 사용을 방지하기 위해서는 본인의 암호를 반드시 비밀로 유지하셔야 합니다.
 
쿠키
 
Lockwood Publishing은 Sodium에서 ‘쿠키’를 사용합니다. 쿠키는 이전에 Sodium을 방문하신 적이 있으신지와 같은 내용의 정보를 사용자의 컴퓨터에 저장해 두는 하나의 방법으로, Lockwood Publishing은 Sodium과 사용자들께 제공되는 각종 서비스를 향상시키기 위해 이를 사용합니다. 귀하가 Sodium을 사용하실 때 Lockwood Publishing이 쿠키를 사용하기를 원치 않으시는 경우, 사용하고 계신 인터넷 브라우저 설정을 변경해 쿠키를 차단하시면 됩니다. 컴퓨터의 도움말 파일을 참고하시면 설정을 변경하실 수 있지만, 변경하실 경우 Sodium과 게임을 사용하시는 데 영향을 미칠 것이라는 점을 말씀드립니다.
쿠키를 차단하지 않으시는 경우, Sodium은 귀하의 이름과 이메일 주소를 포함, 개인 정보 입력을 요청해서 받은 정보를 저장해 두었다가, 가입 신청 또는 기타 전달문에 자동으로 일부 정보를 삽입해 귀하가 Sodium을 이용하실 때 양식에 정보를 입력해야 하는 번거로움을 줄여들일 수 있습니다.
 
개인 정보 보호
 
개인 정보 보호, 본 개인 정보 보호 규정 또는 Sodium과 관련해 그 외 일체의 우려 사항이 있으신 경우, 아래 나와 있는 대로 Lockwood Publishing에 연락해 주시기 바랍니다.

Policy on Privacy, Data, Cookies and Marketing Communications
 
Lockwood Publishing will only use information collected about you in accordance with the Data Protection Act 1998.
 
Data
 
Lockwood Publishing may ask you for certain information and you may submit personal data to Sodium (such as your name, email address and contact details) when you subscribe or sign up to Sodium.
 
Lockwood Publishing may also record which parts of Sodium and services you are interested in as well as user traffic patterns and site use. This information will be kept securely in accordance with an internal security policy and may be used to:
(a) process your Communications, your subscription to Sodium and to enable your use of Sodium and associated services;
(b) open and run your account and provide you with an up to date, efficient and reliable service;
(c) administer prize draws;
(d) generally run Sodium.
 
By subscribing and submitting your data you agree to this use.
 
From time to time Lockwood Publishing also monitor and record telephone calls for training purposes and to improve the service to you.
Lockwood Publishing will never collect sensitive information about you without your explicit consent.
If you believe Lockwood Publishing has information about you that you do not want Lockwood Publishing to have or that is incorrect please contact Lockwood Publishing as described below and Lockwood Publishing shall correct or remove the data as you request as soon as reasonably practicable.
 
Marketing Communications
 
Lockwood Publishing gives you a choice of whether or not you want Lockwood Publishing or other reputable companies to contact you about future offers, events and new services or related activities that you may find useful. Lockwood Publishing will not sell or trade personal information to other companies but Lockwood Publishing would like to keep you informed of the developments on Sodium and certain other games produced by Lockwood Publishing. 
Lockwood Publishing will not send you any marketing emails or pass your information on to third parties unless you give your consent or you have given it already. 
 
In Game Advertising
 
Sodium incorporates dynamic advertisement serving technology which enables advertising to be temporarily uploaded into the game on your console and replaced while you are online. If you play these games, we will log information from your console to ensure that the appropriate advertising is presented at the right location within the game and to calculate number of unique and repeat views of advertising. Logged data may include IP address and console MAC address, in game location, length of time an advert was visible, size of the advert and angle of view. We may use information which we have about you to present adverts which we believe will be of particular interest to you. Logged data will be shared with third party companies who operate the advertisement serving technology
 
Security
 
We take commercially reasonable steps to protect your personal information. This includes setting up processes and procedures to minimise unauthorised access to or disclosure of your information. However, we do not guarantee that we will eliminate all risk of misuse of your personal information by intruders. It is important that you keep your password secret to prevent unauthorised access to and use of your PSN account and any payment details which you have saved for your account.
 
Cookies
 
Lockwood Publishing uses ‘cookies’ on Sodium. Cookies are a way that information such as whether you have visited Sodium before is recorded on your computer and used by Lockwood Publishing to improve Sodium and the services available to you. If you do not wish for Lockwood Publishing to use cookies when you use Sodium please adjust your Internet browser settings to not accept cookies. Your computer’s help file should tell you how to do this but please note that this may affect your ability to use Sodium and games.
If you don’t disable cookies Sodium will ask for and store details including your name and email address and may automatically insert certain information on the subscription or Communications forms so that you can use Sodium with less form filling.
 
Privacy
 
If you have any other concerns over privacy, this privacy policy or Sodium please contact Lockwood Publishing as described below.

私隱、資料、Cookie 和市場傳訊政策
 
Lockwood Publishing 將只會依照 1998 年資料保護法案的規定使用所收集的有關你的資訊。
 
資料
 
訂閱或註冊加入 Sodium 時，Lockwood Publishing 可能會要求你提供若干資訊，你可能需要將個人資料提交予 Sodium （如你的姓名、電郵地址和聯絡資料等）。
 
Lockwood Publishing 還可能記錄你對 Sodium 哪些部分和服務感興趣，以及用戶流量模式和站點使用情況。此項資訊將根據內部安全政策保密，並可用於：
(a) 處理你的通訊以及你訂閱 Sodium 的狀況，使你能夠使用 Sodium 以及相關服務；
(b) 開啟和執行你的帳戶，並為你提供最新、高效率和可靠的服務；
(c) 管理抽獎；
(d) 執行 Sodium。
 
你訂閱和提交個人資料，代表你同意上述使用方式。
 
 Lockwood Publishing 也會不時監察和記錄電話內容，以用於培訓目的及改善為你提供的服務。
未經你明示同意，Lockwood Publishing 絕不會收集有關你的敏感資訊。
如果你相信 Lockwood Publishing 持有關於你的資料，而你不希望 Lockwood Publishing 持有這些資料，或者這些資料有錯誤，請按下述方法聯絡 Lockwood Publishing。Lockwood Publishing 將按你的要求，儘快以合理可行的方式更正或刪除相關資料。
 
市場傳訊
 
Lockwood Publishing 讓你選擇是否希望 Lockwood Publishing 或其他信譽良好的公司，就未來的新產品、活動、新服務或你可能認為有用的相關活動聯絡你。Lockwood Publishing 不會將你的個人資料出售或交易給其他公司，但 Lockwood Publishing 會將有關 Sodium 和 Lockwood Publishing 製作的其他遊戲的發展情況通知你。
Lockwood Publishing 不會向你發送任何行銷電郵或將你的資料傳給第三方，除非現在許可或已經許可。
 
遊戲內廣告
 
Sodium 已整合動態廣告服務技術，能在你上線時將廣告暫時上載到你的遊戲機上的遊戲中，並更換原有廣告。如果你玩這些遊戲，我們將記錄你的遊戲機上的資料，以確保相關廣告在遊戲內的正確位置顯示，並計算單次和重複檢視廣告的次數。記錄的資料可包括 IP 位址和遊戲機的 MAC 位址、遊戲內的位置、可看到廣告的時間長度、廣告大小和觀看角度。我們可能會使用有關你的資訊，向你展示相信會令你感興趣的廣告。記錄的資料將與運行廣告服務技術的第三方公司共用。
 
安全
 
我們將採用商業上合理的措施保護你的個人資料，包括設定過程和程序，儘量減少未經授權存取你的資料的情況或披露你的資料。但是，我們不能保證能夠消除入侵者濫用你的個人資料的所有風險。你的密碼必須保密，以防有人未經授權存取及使用你的 PSN 帳戶，以及你為帳戶儲存的任何付款詳情。
 
Cookie
 
Lockwood Publishing 在 Sodium 上使用 Cookie。Cookie 是一種服務方式，此舉將於你的電腦上記錄你先前曾否前往 Sodium 等事項。這些資料由 Lockwood Publishing 使用，以改善 Sodium 和為你提供的服務。如果你不希望 Lockwood Publishing 在你使用 Sodium 時使用 Cookie，請將你的互聯網瀏覽器設定調整為不接受 Cookie。你的電腦上的說明檔案會告訴你如何操作；但是請注意，這會影響你使用 Sodium 和遊戲的能力。
如果你不停用 Cookie，Sodium 會詢問並存儲你的詳細資料，包括你的姓名和電郵地址，並自動將這些資料插入訂閱或通訊表格，以便你在使用 Sodium 時可填寫較少表格。
 
私隱
 
如果你有其他有關私隱、本私隱政策和 Sodium 的疑問，請按下述方法聯絡 Lockwood Publishing。

隱私、數據、Cookie和行銷公關政策
 
Lockwood Publishing 將僅依照 1998 年資料保護法的規定，來使用所收集到的您的相關資訊。
 
資料
 
當您訂閱或登記加入 Sodium 時，Lockwood Publishing 可能會要求您提供若干資料，您可能需要將您的個人資料提交 Sodium （像是您的姓名、電子郵件信箱地址以及聯絡[料]
 
Lockwood Publishing 還可能記錄您對 Sodium 哪些部分和服務感興趣以及用戶連線模式和站點使用情況。這些資料將根據內部安全政策保密，並可能用於：
(a) 處理您的通信以及您提交 Sodium 的資料，使您能夠使用 Sodium 以及相關服務；
(b) 打開和經營您的帳戶，並為您提供最新、有效率和可靠的服務；
(c) 管理抽獎；
(d) 使用 Sodium。
 
透過訂閱和提交您的資料，您將同意相關使用。
 
 為了訓練員工與改善提供給您的服務品質，Lockwood Publishing 還可能不時監控和記錄電話通話內容。
未經您的明確同意，Lockwood Publishing 將不會收集關於您的敏感資訊。
如果您認為 Lockwood Publishing 擁有關於您且您不希望 Lockwood Publishing 擁有或錯誤的資料，請依照下列方法聯絡 Lockwood Publishing， Lockwood Publishing 將按照您的要求儘快以實際可行的方法更正或刪除相關資料。
 
行銷公關
 
Lockwood Publishing 讓您選擇是否同意 Lockwood Publishing 或其他信譽良好的公司，就未來的新產品、活動、新服務或您認為有用的相關活動聯絡您。Lockwood Publishing 不會將您的個人資料出售或交換給其他公司，但 Lockwood Publishing 會將有關 Sodium 和 Lockwood Publishing 製作的其他遊戲的發展情況通知您。
Lockwood Publishing 不會向您發送任何電子廣告郵件或將您的資料移交給第三方，除非您同意或已經同意。 
 
遊戲內廣告
 
Sodium 具有動態廣告技術，能在您上線時將廣告臨時上傳到您的控制臺上的遊戲中並更換原有廣告。 如果您玩這些遊戲，我們將記錄來自您的控制臺的資料，以確保適當廣告出現在遊戲內的正確位置，並計算單次和重複觀看廣告的次數。 記錄的資料可包括 IP 地址和控制臺 MAC 地址、遊戲內的位置、顯示廣告的時間長度、廣告的大小和觀看角度。 我們可能會使用有關您的資料向您展示您可能會感興趣的廣告。記錄的資料將與經營廣告服務技術的第三方公司共用。
 
安全
 
我們將採用商業上合理的措施保護您的個人資料，其中包括設定流程和處理程序以減少有人在未經授權之下存取或揭露您的資料。但是我們無法保證能夠免除入侵者濫用您的個人資料的所有風險。您必須對自己的密碼保密，以防未獲授權的人員存取和使用您的 PSN 帳戶以及您為帳戶保存的任何付款詳情。
 
Cookie
 
Lockwood Publishing 在 Sodium 上使用 Cookie。 Cookie是一種服務模式，它會在您的電腦上記錄您先前是否來過 Sodium，相關資訊將由 Lockwood Publishing 使用，以改進 Sodium 和為您提供的服務。 如果您不希望 Lockwood Publishing 在您使用 Sodium 時使用 Cookie，請將您的網際網路瀏覽器設置調整為不接受 Cookie。您電腦上的說明檔會告訴您如何操作，但請注意，這樣做會影響您使用 Sodium 和遊戲的能力。
如果您不禁用 Cookie，Sodium 會詢問並存儲您的詳細資料，包括您的姓名和電子郵件地址，並自動將特定資料輸入訂閱或通訊表格，以便您在使用 Sodium 時無須填寫相關表格。
 
隱私
 
如果您有其他有關隱私、本隱私政策以及 Sodium 的顧慮，請按下述方法聯絡 Lockwood Publishing。

Policy on Privacy, Data, Cookies and Marketing Communications
 
Lockwood Publishing will only use information collected about you in accordance with the Data Protection Act 1998.
 
Data
 
Lockwood Publishing may ask you for certain information and you may submit personal data to Sodium (such as your name, email address and contact details) when you subscribe or sign up to Sodium.
 
Lockwood Publishing may also record which parts of Sodium and services you are interested in as well as user traffic patterns and site use. This information will be kept securely in accordance with an internal security policy and may be used to:
(a) process your Communications, your subscription to Sodium and to enable your use of Sodium and associated services;
(b) open and run your account and provide you with an up to date, efficient and reliable service;
(c) administer prize draws;
(d) generally run Sodium.
 
By subscribing and submitting your data you agree to this use.
 
From time to time Lockwood Publishing also monitor and record telephone calls for training purposes and to improve the service to you.
Lockwood Publishing will never collect sensitive information about you without your explicit consent.
If you believe Lockwood Publishing has information about you that you do not want Lockwood Publishing to have or that is incorrect please contact Lockwood Publishing as described below and Lockwood Publishing shall correct or remove the data as you request as soon as reasonably practicable.
 
Marketing Communications
 
Lockwood Publishing gives you a choice of whether or not you want Lockwood Publishing or other reputable companies to contact you about future offers, events and new services or related activities that you may find useful. Lockwood Publishing will not sell or trade personal information to other companies but Lockwood Publishing would like to keep you informed of the developments on Sodium and certain other games produced by Lockwood Publishing. 
Lockwood Publishing will not send you any marketing emails or pass your information on to third parties unless you give your consent or you have given it already. 
 
In Game Advertising
 
Sodium incorporates dynamic advertisement serving technology which enables advertising to be temporarily uploaded into the game on your console and replaced while you are online. If you play these games, we will log information from your console to ensure that the appropriate advertising is presented at the right location within the game and to calculate number of unique and repeat views of advertising. Logged data may include IP address and console MAC address, in game location, length of time an advert was visible, size of the advert and angle of view. We may use information which we have about you to present adverts which we believe will be of particular interest to you. Logged data will be shared with third party companies who operate the advertisement serving technology
 
Security
 
We take commercially reasonable steps to protect your personal information. This includes setting up processes and procedures to minimise unauthorised access to or disclosure of your information. However, we do not guarantee that we will eliminate all risk of misuse of your personal information by intruders. It is important that you keep your password secret to prevent unauthorised access to and use of your PSN account and any payment details which you have saved for your account.
 
Cookies
 
Lockwood Publishing uses ‘cookies’ on Sodium. Cookies are a way that information such as whether you have visited Sodium before is recorded on your computer and used by Lockwood Publishing to improve Sodium and the services available to you. If you do not wish for Lockwood Publishing to use cookies when you use Sodium please adjust your Internet browser settings to not accept cookies. Your computer’s help file should tell you how to do this but please note that this may affect your ability to use Sodium and games.
If you don’t disable cookies Sodium will ask for and store details including your name and email address and may automatically insert certain information on the subscription or Communications forms so that you can use Sodium with less form filling.
 
Privacy
 
If you have any other concerns over privacy, this privacy policy or Sodium please contact Lockwood Publishing as described below.
